alert.note: Alert for Southern Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 6:43PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Herkimer County through 730 PM EDT... At 643 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over New Hartford, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ilion, Mohawk, Frankfort, West Winfield, Poland, Cedarville, Elizabethtown, Jersalem Hill, West Frankfort, Spinnerville, Corrado Corners, Cedar Lake, Farrel Corner, North Ilion, Gulph, South Columbia, South Ilion, Chepachet, Columbia Center and Stewart Corners. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized poor drainage flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for eastern New York.
